name: Bug Report
about: Report a bug or unexpected behavior on a DS component
title: "[Bug] - Toolkit"
labels: bug
assignees: vitingr, medinavs, LuisBarbosaGit
---

## Bug Report

### Problem Description

Clearly and objectively describe the bug you found.

### Current Behavior

Explain what is happening today and why it is a problem.

### Expected Behavior

Describe what you expected to happen instead.

### Steps to Reproduce

List the steps to reproduce the issue.

- [ ] Go to '...'
- [ ] Click on '...'
      ...

### Screenshots (optional)

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain the problem.

### Debugging

- [ ] Is this happening in production?
- [ ] Is this happening in development?
